item.title: System Center 2012 SP1 – General Availability
item.description: System Center 2012 SP1 Final release was made available to public (General Availability) on 15thJan. System Center SP1 delivers many enhanced capabilities across both desktop management and datacenter management. Some of the key changes with SP1 for Datacenter Management Support for Windows Server 2012 and SQL Server 2012 Software Defined Networking (Network Virtualization) Global Service Monitor with Windows Azure / Visual Studio & Operations Manager Hybrid Cloud Management (Integration of Off-premises Resources in to your own Datacenter) Cloud-based Pricing and Chargeback Copy an On-premises Virtual Machine to Windows Azure Windows Azure Online Backup integration with Data Protection Manager More information â€“
